default: ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
1 tin cannellini beans, rinsed and drained

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the chorizo, celery, garlic and pepper, and cook over a medium heat for two minutes, until the chorizo is browned.
Place the tomato seeds and the flesh of two of the tomatoes into a food processor and blend. Add to the pan.
Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for five minutes.
title: Tomato, bean and chorizo stew
